alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 15 at 5:22PM EST until November 15 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: The National Weather Service in Key West has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Middle Keys in Monroe County in Florida... Upper Keys in Monroe County in Florida... * Until 545 PM EST. * At 522 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Lower Matecumbe Key, or near East End Of Channel 5 Bridge, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lower Matecumbe Key around 525 PM EST. Craig Key and Teatable Key around 530 PM EST. Upper Matecumbe Key around 535 PM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Layton and Islamorada. This includes US 1 between mile markers 69 and 84. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
